meanings.definition: A building or room equipped for indoor sports and exercise.
meanings.sent1: The gymnasium had basketball hoops and exercise equipment.
meanings.sent2: We played volleyball in the gymnasium after school.
meanings.sent3: The gymnasium was so big, it felt like a sports arena!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a gymnasium of ideas, constantly in motion.
meanings.sent5: The gymnasium echoed with the sounds of sneakers squeaking on the floor.

meanings.definition: A school or college for physical education.
meanings.sent1: The gymnasium offered classes in fitness and health.
meanings.sent2: She studied hard to get into the prestigious gymnasium.
meanings.sent3: At the gymnasium, they even had a class on juggling!
meanings.sent4: His body was a gymnasium of strength and agility.
meanings.sent5: The gymnasium was a place where students learned to care for their bodies.
